> <OLD>
>
> Night Shift sighs and transforms.
>
> "Yeah well, can't be avoi=
ded. C'mon, we're outa here. Fastest way ta safe
ground."
>
> Rat Trap gets=
 in and buckles himself in the driver's seat.
>
> "I sure hope you got good=
 tires buddy."
>
> Night Shift replies.
>
> "Yeah, I'm good, tranny's workn=
' suspension's up ta snuff, we're as good
as outa here. No worries, I got f=
our wheel drive, we'll make it outa here."
>
> He starts to roll in the opp=
osite direction, hoping to get himself and Rat
Trap to saftey while still t=
racking the Unicronian signature, hoping to find
its origin.

<NEW>

The gr=
ound rumbled as Nightshift revved his engine and took off across the
burnt =
and scorched terrain. Behind them the volcano began to spew large
chunks of=
 molten rock into the skies again, accompanied by smoke and ash. As
they ha=
d already noted the air was definitely taking a definite sulfur and
acidic =
odor. On the horizon dark clouds boiled and frothed =96 clouds made up
not =
of water but of soot and ash and dirt that floated in the air like
deadly s=
mog.

The Magma continued inexorably towards Nightshift as he moved like se=
om
boiling red wave, but so far he was able to keep ahead of it. As the gro=
und
began to level out the speed that the liquid rock moved was beginning t=
o
slow.

As Rat Trap and Nightshift tried to scan for Unicronian energy sig=
natures,
at first they came up empty, it would seem that their quarry had e=
scaped
them for the moment.

Meanwhile ahead of them were the remains of a =
small forest. It was here that
the Magma was coming to a stop as they were =
coming to the fringes of the
broken landscape, the forest a victim of the r=
avages from the initial
assault from the now distant volcano. The leaves an=
d brush of this forest
had been all burnt away but the trees still remained=
, looking much like
burnt matchsticks all facing skyward. There did not app=
ear to be any signs
of biological life.

However, despite the lack of any l=
iving signals Nightshift was able to pick
up a single faint Unicronian sign=
ature coming from just ahead. It was
difficult to get more then direction f=
rom it.

The direction indicated that is was located somewhere inside the b=
urnt out
woods!

(TAG)

Preston
